LOC :FOCUS

A keyboard accessibility game.

Congratulations! You did it!

Make your websites keyboard accessible.


Learn more with the following public resources:


  • Keyboard Accessibility, WebAIM
  • If it’s interactive, it needs a focus style, @ericwbailey
  • A guide to designing accessible focus indicators, @SaraSoueidan
  • Avoid Default Browser Focus Styles, @aardrian

To learn more about accessibility, check out the Digital Accessility Hub.

If you have questions, email accessibility-request@loc.gov.

This game is based on Hocus :focus by @HTeuMeuLeu.
